Package net.jawr.web.resource.bundle.factory.util

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    ConfigChangeListener
    Interface for a listener to changes in Jawr configuration.
    ConfigPropertiesSource
    Interface for classes which act as a source for getting jawr configuration properties.
    ServletContextAware
    Defines a component which can get a ServletContext injected during initializing.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ClassLoaderResourceUtils
    Utilities to access resources from the classpath
    ConfigChangeListenerThread
    A threaded component that periodically checks for updates to the configuration of Jawr.
    ConfigPropertiesAugmenter
    Utility class which can be used to merge several configuration sources.
    MultipleFileConfigSource  
    PathNormalizer
    Utility class to work with relative paths.
    PropertiesConfigHelper
    Helper class to make properties access less verbose.
    PropsFilePropertiesSource
    ConfigPropertiesSource implementation that reads its values from a .properties file.
    RegexUtil
    Utils to work with regular expressions and matchers
    ResourceBundleDefinition
    Transfer object meant for a factory to use to create a JoinableResourceBundle.
